content.body:
### Shop 245/30ZR22 Tire Size
In the 00s and ‘10s, vehicles such as the Cadillac XTS, Chevrolet Impala, Malibu and Camaro, Mazda Tribute and Ford Mustang all left the factory rolling on 245/30ZR22 tires. If you’ve got one of these cars, chances are you’re looking for replacement tires that offer good year-round traction, long wear, responsive handling, good road manners and a quiet, comfortable ride. 

245/30ZR22 is commonly found on performance-oriented cars, and these cars need a set of tires that can perform at higher speeds. Check out the [Pirelli P Zero (PZ4-Sport)](https://simpletire/com/brands/pirelli-tires/p-zero-pz4-sport), Nexen N Fera SU1, Nitto Invo, and Maxxis MA-Z4S Victra.

Whether you drive a FOrd Mustang, Chevrolet Camaro, Cadillac XTS, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 245/30ZR22 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
